## VFS.getCwd() method

Gets the current working directory.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCwd(): string;
```
**Returns:**

string

The current working directory path

## Example


```typescript
const cwd = fs.getCwd();
console.log(`Current directory: ${cwd}`);
```
